hero.title: Control your phone hands-free.
hero.subtitle: AirTap turns face gestures into taps, likes, back and swipe — so you can use apps without touching the screen.

bullets.b3: Made for real-world use (TikTok, Reels, browsing)

how.title: How it works
how.s2d: Close your eyes for 2 seconds to switch modes.
how.s3d: Like, Back, Pause and Swipe with simple face gestures.

gestures.likeDesc: Wink with your right eye to like.
gestures.backDesc: Wink with your left eye to go back.
gestures.swipeDesc: Turn your head slightly to swipe.
gestures.pauseDesc: Hold a nod to pause or play.
gestures.lockDesc: On the Home screen, double nod to lock/unlock.
gestures.volumeDesc: Tilt your head to adjust volume.
